inclusion.criterion: Sera available and appropriate for testing
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Unequivocal HCV antibody positive or HCV RNA positive
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Those unwilling to give informed consent
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Persons with Hepatitis B Virus infection
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection, on IFN and RBV combination therapy for 9 months. Direct antiviral drugs added 6 months ago.
